item.title: By: Peter Cook
item.dc:creator: Peter Cook
item.description:
Salut François.
I just discovered your blog and am enjoying it very much.
Have you seen the CBC "app" for the SqueezeBox?
http://www.mysqueezebox.com/appgallery/CBC
It points to an opml file I put together for CBC Radio 1, 2 & 3. I should add the French net content!
Great to meet you earlier this week.
item.content:encoded:
Salut François.

I just discovered your blog and am enjoying it very much.

Have you seen the CBC “app” for the SqueezeBox?

http://www.mysqueezebox.com/appgallery/CBC

It points to an opml file I put together for CBC Radio 1, 2 & 3. I should add the French net content!

Great to meet you earlier this week.
